    • Constructor Detail

      • ForecastIO

        public ForecastIO(java.lang.String apiKey,
          java.lang.Double latitude,
          java.lang.Double longitude)
        Constructor for the class which takes the apiKey, latitude and logitude arguments.

        This method merely sets these options, but does not actually make the request

        Parameters:
        apiKey - Your forecast.io api key.
        latitude - Latitude value for coordinates you are requesting weather for
        longitude - Longitude value for coordinates you are requesting weather for

        Parameters:
        options - Values of parameters that are accepted by the API.
